com.teama.pds
Class TimeReader

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.TimeReader

public class TimeReader
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Grant Kurtz This Entity class is just used as a separation of privileges, so as to avoid a chef accidentally altering the time without given the rest of the simulation a chance to update. Just like in the Time class, all values given to or returned from this class are reported in seconds.
